categories.name: forest
categories.description: There is a path leading into a forest. The path should lead to something, but probably not much.

categories.name: abandoned facility
categories.description: Some large and abandoned building stands on its own. It could have some good stuff in it, but that might come at additional risk.

categories.name: village
